## About Brave Nightly
Brave Nightly serves as the bleeding-edge development version of the Brave browser, providing early access to the latest privacy enhancements, performance improvements, and experimental features before they reach the stable release channel. This development build allows privacy enthusiasts, web developers, and Brave community members to test new functionality, identify potential issues, and provide feedback that helps shape the future of the browser. As the most frequently updated version in Brave's release cycle, Nightly offers a glimpse into the ongoing development process and the evolution of privacy-focused web browsing technology.

The desktop application delivers the most recent Brave browser developments for both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring daily updates that incorporate the latest Chromium base along with Brave-specific modifications. Brave Nightly includes experimental ad-blocking filters, new cryptocurrency wallet features, testing versions of the Brave Rewards system, and unreleased privacy protections that may eventually benefit all Brave users. While intended for testing purposes and potentially less stable than release versions, Nightly provides valuable insight into the browser's development direction and enables technically-inclined users to contribute to Brave's mission of creating a faster, more private web experience for everyone.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space
